topic.title: For Shinken
topic.shortdesc: Configure GLPI Web Services for Shinken

body.p: In GLPI, go to the menu Plugins > Web Services, and add a new web service. Set these values:

ul.li: Compression enabled: No (not tested with compression enabled)
Log connections: No (activate it if you want to keep track of connections)
IP address range: set IP range, in this case set twice the IP of your server where Shinken is installed
User name: (keep empty in this case)

body.p: Click on the add button. The web service for Shinken is then created and access is granted to the Shinken server.
